pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Emotional Balance 60 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Supports healthy mood balance and emotional wellbeing.

Wanderlust Emotional Balance is a consciously created blend of plant actives. St John's Wort supports healthy mood balance and emotional wellbeing. Passionflower is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine as a calmative, to relieve sleeplessness and reduce symptoms of stress. Lemon Balm is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to relieve symptoms of nervous indigestion.

Size: 60 Capsules

Warnings

Contains sulfites.

St John's Wort affects the way many prescription medicines work - including the oral contraceptive pill. Consult your doctor.

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH CAPSULE CONTAINS:
Hypericum perforatum (St John's Wort) herb top flowering ext. dry conc. stand. 300 mg
Derived from min. dry 1.8 g
Equiv Hyperforin 9 mg
Equiv Hypericin 990 micrograms

Passiflora incarnata (Passionflower) herb top flowering and fruiting ext. dry conc. 75 mg
Derived from dry 750 mg

Melissa officinalis (Lemon Balm) herb ext. dry conc. 25 mg
Derived from dry 1 g

Avena sativa (Oat) herb ext. dry conc. 75 mg
Derived from dry 750 mg

Scutellaria lateriflora (Skullcap) herb ext. dry conc. 5 mg
Derived from dry 500 mg

Ziziphus jujuba var. spinosa (Ziziphus) seed ext. dry conc. 28.57 mg
Derived from dry 500 mg

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, soy, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours. Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Take two capsules daily or as directed by your healthcare practitioner.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C in a cool, dry place. Do not use if cap seal or inner seal is missing or broken.
